item.description:
I have recently started doing a Tuesday KARAOKE show at the awesome new restaurant, The Station House Wine Bar & Grill down on Main Street in Stratford.

It is adjacent to the Metro North train station (Westbound/New York City Side) and has a fabulous array of wines, top shelf liquors, beers and cordials along with a full sushi menu (one of the best in Fairfield County!).

The chefs also prepare special dinner and appetizer menus daily.

The bartenders and wait staff will attend to your every need.

All this, PLUS karaoke on Tuesday Evenings (beginning "early" at 8 PM!) with Jim Mac Donald!!!

It doesn't get any better than this....

http://stationhousewinebar.com/

Â 

stationhousewinebar.com/
item.how_to_find_us: 2520 Main Street, Stratford CT 06615. (aka Railroad Station West - Metro North NYC Bound Side)

group.name: Karaoke Lovers of Greater New Haven .

item.name: Karaoke on Tuesdays @ the Stationhouse Wine Bar in Stratford
